backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining weather types and simple query methods returning fixed weather, daily, and weekly forecast data.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module initializing new actor state with an empty oracle cache and zeroed timestamp.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the weather publishing feature to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the roles of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and shared utility classes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling location persistence, weather fetching, alerts, theme selection, and backend publishing of widget weather data.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundIllust: Component displaying themed background images with fade transitions and contrast‑adjusted overlays.
frontend/src/components/BeachMarineScree: UI screen showing marine conditions with loading, error, and empty states driven by location‑based marine data.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with five tabs and icon buttons, using i18n labels and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/DriverWeatherPan: Displays driver-focused weather advisories, route analysis, and loading/error states based on weather data.
frontend/src/components/FarmerGardenWeat: Shows multiple farming-related weather advisories with loading/error handling and location header.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAutocomp: A portal-based floating dropdown that positions itself relative to an anchor and closes on outside click.
frontend/src/components/ImminentWeatherA: Visual banner for imminent weather alerts with severity-based styling, icons, and dismiss support.
frontend/src/components/InitialRenderErr: Error boundary that catches initial render failures and shows a fallback UI with refresh and details.
frontend/src/components/LanguageDropdown: Floating language-selection dropdown that positions near a trigger button and updates locale on selection.
frontend/src/components/LaundryDryingRec: Displays best and alternative laundry drying time ranges based on weather data, or a fallback message when no good times exist.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Provides a searchable geocoding input with autocomplete and shows or clears the currently selected location.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarAlert: Shows an active radar alert with severity‑based styling and a dismiss button.
Provides UI to enable radar alerts and adjust alert radius via a slide‑out sheet.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarEmpty: Displays a centered empty-state message for the radar view using translated strings and an icon.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarInfoP: Shows a summary of radar data including start time, duration, intensity, and direction using computed nowcast info.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarLayer: Provides a side sheet with switches to enable or disable various radar overlay layers.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarMap.t: Initializes and manages a Leaflet map with location markers and dynamic radar/overlay layers based on props.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarOverl: Displays loading, error, or no‑data status messages for non‑precipitation radar overlay layers.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarPlayb: Renders timeline slider and playback controls for navigating radar animation frames.
frontend/src/components/RadarScreen.tsx: Combines location search, radar map, playback, layers, and alerts to render a full radar viewing interface.
frontend/src/components/RouteLocationSea: Offers a compact geocoding search and selection UI for route endpoints with autocomplete and clear actions.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Supplies weather‑based theme context and applies a dark or light mode wrapper.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: Renders current weather details, advisories, and laundry recommendations with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeocodingSearch.ts: Debounces a search query and fetches geocoding results using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useImminentWeatherAle: Evaluates imminent weather alerts, handles dismissal cooldowns, and optionally triggers Android bridge notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarineConditions.t: Uses React Query to fetch marine weather data from Open-Meteo based on given coordinates with timed refresh.
Manages a saved location in localStorage with load, update, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublishWidgetWeath: Defines a mutation to publish weather data to the backend actor for Android widget support, with error logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that data-fetching hooks are implemented elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarAlerts.ts: Tracks radar alert settings and generates simple severe weather alerts based on radar playback frames.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarOverlayData.t: Fetches weather, air quality, and temperature grid data to provide overlay info for radar views.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarPlayback.ts: Manages radar frame playback with controls for play, pause, frame selection, and time labeling.
frontend/src/hooks/useRainViewer.ts: Fetches and caches RainViewer radar data using React Query with periodic refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteWeatherAnalys: Computes weather analysis along a route by interpolating points, fetching weather for each, and running analysis.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Provides sessionStorage-backed React state with automatic load and save behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeather.ts: Fetches and transforms weather and air quality data, computes pressure trend, and exposes it via a React Query hook.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides locale state, translation lookup, and persistence via context and localStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines Turkish translation strings for UI labels, weather terms, and advisories.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Hook that retrieves the i18n context and throws if used outside the provider.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, weather‑based color variants, and glass UI utilities.
frontend/src/lib/clothingAdvisories.ts: Generates clothing suggestions based on temperature, precipitation, and wind using weather data.
frontend/src/lib/driverAdvisories.ts: Calculates road ice and fog warnings using current and near‑term weather conditions.
frontend/src/lib/farmerAdvisories.ts: Computes farming advisories such as frost, soil moisture, precipitation, planting, and spraying guidance from hourly data.
frontend/src/lib/fetchWithTimeout.ts: Provides a fetch wrapper that cancels requests after a timeout and throws a user-friendly error on abort.
frontend/src/lib/formatDailyForecastDate: Formats an ISO date into a localized short weekday-month-day string based on the app locale.
frontend/src/lib/imminentWeatherAlerts.t: Analyzes the next hour of weather data to detect imminent rain, snow, storm, or fog and returns a structured alert.
frontend/src/lib/laundryDrying.ts: Computes hourly drying scores from weather data, classifies them, and derives optimal time ranges for drying laundry.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteo.ts: Fetches and normalizes weather data from the Open-Meteo API using a timeout-enabled fetch wrapper.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteoMarine.ts: Retrieves marine and forecast data to produce combined sea and wind conditions, deriving visibility when missing.
frontend/src/lib/radarNowcastSummary.ts: Generates a simple radar precipitation summary including start time, duration, intensity, and direction.
frontend/src/lib/radarOverlays.ts: Maps radar overlay types to display parameters for storm, snow, wind, temperature, and air quality layers.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewer.ts: Fetches RainViewer radar frames, preserves past and nowcast data, and provides utilities for playback frame selection.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewerCache.ts: Manages sessionStorage-based caching of RainViewerData with a 5‑minute expiry.
frontend/src/lib/routeAnalysis.ts: Analyzes weather data along a route to produce risk level, summary key, and contributing factors.
frontend/src/lib/tirePressure.ts: Computes tire pressure adjustments based on temperature and vehicle type with translation keys.
frontend/src/lib/weatherContrast.ts: Returns whether a weather theme should use a dark background.
frontend/src/lib/weatherTheme.ts: Maps weather codes to themes, icons, and translation description keys.
frontend/src/lib/widgetWeatherPayload.ts: Generates stable publish keys and converts WeatherData into backend-compatible WeatherResponse payloads.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/androidBridge.d.ts: Declares Android bridge interface for triggering native notifications.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Provides Vite type definitions for the project.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS themes, colors, fonts, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-specific Vite build files.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Configures Vite with React plugin, path aliases, dev server, and build settings.
project_state.json: Stores current project state, feature requests, and architectural notes for WeatherVerse.
